ComicInfo.Summary: All hope seems lost. The Shadow, Green Hornet, and the other masked heroes are outnumbered, outgunned, and surrounded by the Black Legion forces of the Justice Party, who are bent on expanding their chokehold on the surrounding countryside. Even the arrival of the new Zorro and Black Bat is not enough to turn the tide. But what of the Spider?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 17:50:15. [CVDB404718]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alex Ross, Ardian Syaf, Francesco Francavilla, Stephen Segovia
ComicInfo.Characters: Black Bat, Black Terror, Green Lama, Kato, Miss Fury (Drake), The Clock, The Green Hornet, The Shadow, The Spider, Zorro
ComicInfo.Teams: Justice Party, Masks, The Black Legions, The Green Hornet and Kato
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
